bibl.title: Two Religious Buildings at Byzantine Marea.
bibl.note: Archeological expedition of the University of Alexandria, 1977-1981. - Identification of twin churches consecrated to St. Menas, Vth-VIth centuries.

bibl.title: in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 2: History, Religion

bibl.seg: HAGGAG Mona, Two Religious Buildings at Byzantine Marea.

Zahi HAWASS (Ed.), in collaboration with Lyla PINCH BROCK, Egyptology at the Dawn of the Twenty-first Century. Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress of Egyptologists, Cairo, 2000. Volume 2: History, Religion (Cairo - New York, 2003) pp. 284-289, 3 figg., 1 plan.
Archeological expedition of the University of Alexandria, 1977-1981. - Identification of twin churches consecrated to St. Menas, Vth-VIth centuries.
